Sections.Name: StrengthDamageModifier
Sections.Description: Values for the strength damage modifier formula

Keys.Name: Enabled
Keys.Description: Whether to tweak the strength damage modifier formula (ie: DamageModifier)

Keys.Name: LinearParameters
Keys.Description: Scale and base of the damage modifier relative to strength value

Sections.Name: MaxEncumbrance
Sections.Description: Values for the strength-based max encumbrance formula

Keys.Name: Enabled
Keys.Description: Whether to tweak the  formula (ie: MaxEncumbrance)

Keys.Name: LinearParameters
Keys.Description: Scale and base of the max encumbrance relative to strength value

Sections.Name: HandToHandMinDamage
Sections.Description: Values for the hand-to-hand minimum damage formula

Keys.Name: Enabled
Keys.Description: Whether to tweak the hand-to-hand minimum formula (ie: CalculateHandToHandMinDamage)

Keys.Name: LinearParameters
Keys.Description: Scale and base of the minimum damage relative to skill level

Sections.Name: HandToHandMaxDamage
Sections.Description: Values for the hand-to-hand maximum damage formula

Keys.Name: Enabled
Keys.Description: Whether to tweak the hand-to-hand maximum formula (ie: CalculateHandToHandMaxDamage)

Keys.Name: LinearParameters
Keys.Description: Scale and base of the maximum damage relative to skill level
